review: 수건은 냄새나는 걸레, 남탕 직원은 고객에게 짜증내고 애들은 찜질방내에서 달리기하고.....다시 오기싫음....조만간 망할분위기
review_en: The towel is a smelly mop, the male bath staff is annoyed by the customer, and the kids are running in the jjimjilbang... ...don't want to come back.Sooner or later, it's going to be ruined.m.

review: 좀 오래 됐어요. 찾아가기는 쉽고, 역에서도 가깝고 위치는 좋아요. 시설은 좋은 곳은 아니어서 그냥 목욕하러 가시기엔 괜찮을 수도 있어요. 두번은 안가게 되는 곳입니다.
review_en: It's been a while. It's easy to find, close to the station, and good location. The facility is not a good place, so it might be okay to just go for a bath. It's a place where you don't go twice.

review: 큰 대중 목욕탕입니다. 시설은 좀 오래 되어서 그렇고,회사 근처에 있어서 가끔 사우나 하러 갔었습니다.그냥 동네 큰 목욕탕이라 생각하면 됩니다.
review_en: It's a big public bath. The facility is a bit old, so I went to the sauna sometimes because it was near the company.Just think of it as a big bathhouse in the neighborhood.

review: 블로그 후기가 좋아 기대 했지만 정말 별로임.. 사우나 수건은 퀘퀘한 냄새.. 다 찢어지고... 기대했던 찜질방은 온도도 멋대로이고 이글루방은 공사중.. 공사한다 써있지 않아 들어가서 당황.. 옷 대여비용 전체 9천원.. 큰 돈은 아니지만 아까움.. 사진자료 찍다 말아서 많지 않음..
review_en: I was looking forward to your blog review, but it's really not... Sauna towels smell good. It's all torn... The temperature of the sauna is okay and the igloo room is under construction. It doesn't say it's under construction. I'm embarrassed... The total cost of renting clothes is 9,000 won. It's not a lot of money, but it's a waste. Not many photos taken.

review: 예전 오락프로그램전에 리모델링하기전부터 다녔으며 리모델링후 좀더 편한하고 깨끗해졌습니다 위치는 동서울호텔 대각선에 위치해 있으며 지하철은 강변역 내린후 15분정도 도보 버스는 건대역 롯데앞에서 마을버스 이용해서 동서울호텔앞 하차하면 도보1분 자차는 빌딩 지하주차장 주차하시면 되고요 내부는 아까 말씀드렸듯이 깨끗하며 식당에서는 주로 미역국에 밥먹습니다 그리고 매점에서 식혜하나 쭉 마시면 든든하고 잠도 소로록 오더라구요 단 가끔 조선족들때문에 귀때기 떨어질만큼 시끄러울때 있습니다 바로
review_en: I went before the remodeling of the past entertainment program, and after the remodeling, it became more comfortable and clean. The location is located at the diagonal line of the East Seoul Hotel. For 15 minutes after getting off at the Gangbyeon Station, you can use the village bus in front of Lotte Station to park the underground parking lot of the building for 1 minute on foot. As I said, the inside is clean, and the restaurant usually eats seaweed soup. And if you drink sikhye all the way from the store, you feel reassured and sleep tight, but sometimes it's loud enough to make your ears drop because of ethnic Koreans. Right now

review: 강변역 뒤쪽에 위치하고 있어서 찾아가기 쉽습니다. 사우나가 넓고 물이 깨끗해서 사워하기 좋아요..
review_en: It is located behind the Gangbyeon station, so it is easy to find. The sauna is wide and the water is clean, so it is good to take care of.

review: 강변역 근처에 위치해 걸어갈수있어요 식당이나 매점 음식도 맛있는 편이고 찜질방도 다양해서 종종 이용해요 목욕탕은 자리가 아주 많지는 않지만 불편함은 없어요 늦은시간에 가낌 외국인도 오는 듯 해요
review_en: It is located near the riverside station and you can walk there. I often use jjimjilbang because the food in restaurants and snack bars is delicious. There aren't many bathrooms, but there's no inconvenience. I think some foreigners are coming late.

review: 먼 길 가기전 터미널 근처에 있어서 가볼 수는 있겠지만 그냥 스파 목적이라면 괜찮을 것 같음
review_en: It is near the terminal before going a long way, so I can go, but if it is just for spa purposes, I think it will be fine.
